local_intent: Perceive red plate, approach and align, lower until contact, verify contact, place using place_pose, release and retreat.
assumptions: place_pose was set earlier in the global tree (SetBlackboard).
White plate is currently held in the gripper from the prior Pick step.
Environment and kinematics allow small cartesian lowering to detect contact.
coherence_with_global: Subtree implements the 'place' phase of the global BT: it verifies red_plate visibility, aligns, performs the LowerUntilContact action (as in LOCAL_ANNOTATION), confirms contact, executes PlaceAt using place_pose, opens the gripper, and retreatsâ€”matching the GLOBAL_BT step sequence and GLOBAL_DESCRIPTION intent.
